main event: Several observers sighted 2 lights approaching Bermuda from the south on 29 Aug 53.
interesting points: The lights moved in an erratic, zigzagging manner at a very high rate of speed, estimated between 1500-2000 mph., The observers are confident that what they saw were real., Balloons are ruled out as they do not maneuver as these objects did., The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes., No known natural phenomena can account for what was sighted.
